moduleMetadataJson.name: DNS Spoofing Helper Service
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module provides a DNS service that returns TXT
      records indicating information about the querying service.
      Based on Dino Dai Zovi DNS code from Karma.
author: hdm <x@hdm.io>
ddz <ddz@theta44.org>

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SRVHOST
options.description: The local host to listen on.

options.name: SRVPORT
options.description: The local port to listen on.
